name: Temperform
description:
Temperform is a 3D puzzle adventure game, where navigating the depths of a cavernous world is made possible through the manipulations of powerful crystals. In the depths of the Earth, ancient secrets of an alien world have been uncovered and its up to the young explorer to find their way through this abandoned, enigmatic facility to see what caused this place to be lost through time.

This is a student game, and as such will likely not be updated. Your playtime is valued very much, so if you have any comments for how we could improve for next time, please let us know. Thanks!

Contact: https://twitter.com/SwinTemperform
